title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 489.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 489.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part shall apply to family-type homes for adults as defined
herein. (b) Parts 485 and 486 of
this Title shall apply to family-type homes, except as specifically
limited. (c) Any person who
operates a family-type home is subject to the jurisdiction of the department
and must comply with these regulations or modify or cease operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
489.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
